description: Detects when trans people are erased through denial, restriction, or politicization of gender-affirming healthcare.
patterns: State-level bans on puberty blockers and HRT
Insurance refusal to cover medically recognized care
Framing transition as 'experimental' despite established evidence
examples: Arkansas ban on gender-affirming care for minors (2021)
Insurance exclusions labeling transition-related care as 'cosmetic'
consequence: Undermines survival and wellbeing by denying embodied autonomy.
